H0.text: Since 1951, what is the maximum number of full consecutive terms to be filled by one US president. 1

H1.text: Since 1951, what is the maximum number of full consecutive terms to be filled by one US president. 3

H2.text: Since 1951, what is the maximum number of full consecutive terms to be filled by one US president. 4

H3.text: Since 1951, what is the maximum number of full consecutive terms to be filled by one US president. 2

A4.text: Under the Twenty-second Amendment, no person who has been elected to two presidential terms may be elected to a third.

A5.text: The amendment bars anyone from being elected president more than twice.
